    • translatePoint

      public static java.awt.Point translatePoint​(java.awt.Point sourceLocation, java.awt.Point delta)
      This method moves the current location and returns the translated point.
      Parameters:
      sourceLocation - The initial location of the Point.
      delta - Used for translate.
      Returns:

    • getGameObjectAt

      public GameObject getGameObjectAt​(int col, int row) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      This method returns the gameObject after translated.
      Parameters:
      col - The column location of the target object to get.
      row - The row location of the target object to get.
      Returns:
      GameObject at target point.
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - Throws when the array's index is out of bounds.

    • getGameObjectAt

      public GameObject getGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point p)
      This method returns the coordinates of the object location.
      Parameters:
      p - The location of the target object to get.
      Returns:
      The Game Object at the given position.

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, int x, int y)
      This method put the GameObject with the input x and y.

      Invokes the isPointOutOfBounds method to check if the object is out of bounds and return false if isPointOutOfBounds method returns true, else sets the coordinates and returns true.

      Parameters:
      gameObject - The target game object to put.
      x - The x coordinate that the target object will be put.
      y - The y coordinate that the target object will be put.
      Returns:
      Whether the put operation is succeed or not, false if the location is out of bounds.

    • putGameObjectAt

      public boolean putGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point p)
      This method put the GameObject with the input point.

      returns true if the pointer is not null and setting succeed, false if either pointer is null nor setting false.

      Parameters:
      gameObject - The target game object to be put.
      p - The target location where the game object will be placed.
      Returns:
      Whether the put operation is succeed or not.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method translates the gameObject to a string.

      Returns:
      A string of gameObject.

      public java.util.Iterator<GameObject> iterator()
